author: "Alexandra Norris"
date: "11/8/2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)

```

```{r create graphic}

gapminder %>%
  filter(continent == "Europe") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, size = pop, color = country)) + geom_point() + labs(color = "Color", size = "Population", title = "Europe from 1952 to 2007. Year: {time= frame_time}", x = "GDP per capita", y = "Life Expectancy") + transition_time(year) 

```
